name: Transfer SUI Token
title: Transfer SUI Token (Coin)
description: Transfer a SUI token/coin to another address.

inputs.name: Token Type
inputs.description: The token type identifier (e.g., 0x2::sui::SUI for native SUI, or a custom token type).

inputs.name: Receiver Address
inputs.description: The address to receive the tokens.

inputs.name: Amount
inputs.description: Amount of tokens to transfer (in smallest unit).
